title: HAS_PERMISSION
description: Returns TRUE if the context user has any of the specified custom permissions. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: ...custom_permission_names
parameters.description: One or more API names of Custom Permissions to check against the current userâ€™s permission sets.

examples:
HAS_PERMISSION('Admin_Access')
-- Checks if the context user has the 'Admin_Access' permission

HAS_PERMISSION('Manage_Cases', 'View_Case_Data_List')
-- Checks if the context user has either the 'Sales_Access' or 'Marketing_Access' permission
